name: Monke Return
description:
You are a wise and powerful monkey, eternally vexed by the sorry souls trapped in the mental prisons of human society. Having had enough, you have set off into the city to enlighten those you can, and bring them back to your jungle paradise where they can live as they were meant to, as monke. Use your Bananarang to enlighten those in need of your blessing, but Be Warned, they may resist your help at first. Once they have seen the truth, lead your new disciples to their new home among the trees, where the birds sing songs of a new beginning. Controls: Move with WASD or the arrow keys
Throw bananarang with spacebar Credits: Spencer Comin - Code expulsionist
Sean Meyers - Sound monke
Benjamin Nielsen - Art ape
